summary: This mod removes the effects of the "Extra damage" perks that certain npcs have
descriptionHtml:
Have you ever wondered why a level 7 Stormcloak soldier was doing wayyy too much damage to your level 40+ dragonborn? Well I rooted out the culprit. There are a number of perks that alter damage for npcs in an unfair and disingenuous way. I haven't removed them; I simply edited their effects so that they will behave as expected.

To install, simply drag and drop the ESP into the data folder and activate.
I guess you could use nmm. There are no assets, only the esp

As for compatibility, this mod is basically compatible with all mods in that it won't cause skyrim to crash on its own, but if there is a mod that uses one of those perks, then you may have an easier fight than the mod creator intended. That's pretty much it.
author: MonkeyBananas
